name: JazzOut
description:
Description

JazzOut is a breakout-clone-thing I made using the Godot Engine. It was mostly a learning experience for me, but I wanted to put my own spin on it. The goal here is to get rid  blocks to play the song in each level. When all the blocks are gone, you'll hear the whole riff completed. There are 3 levels to beat, each with its own song and number of blocks to destroy. 

I hope you enjoy this little game, and check out my other games if you like this one(or even if you don't!)

Controls

Move: Mouse, Left/Right Keys, L/R Triggers, Left/Right D-Pad

Exit: Escape
